en.backend_error_body: The backend has sent some unparseable data. The same error will not be shown again until next successful connection
en.version_error: Unsupported backend version, please try updating your frontend and contact the administrator. The same error will not be shown again until next successful connection
en.backend_maintenance_body: The backend is being maintenanced. The same warning will not be shown again until next successful connection

zh.backend_error_body: 后端发送了无法解析的数据。下次连接成功前相同错误将不再显示
zh.version_error: 不支持的后端版本，请尝试更新前端并联系管理员。下次连接成功前相同错误将不再显示
zh.backend_maintenance_body: 后端正在维护。下次连接成功前相同警告将不再显示
